course-5.details:
Double your income as a tax preparer with the proven method for climbing the tax industry ladder.

Aim:

This course is aimed at all professional tax preparers who want to become corporate tax preparers. Participants will learn how to prepare Schedule C, Form 1065, Forms 1120, and 1120 S.

ğŸ‘‰ğŸ»To whom it has been addressed:

For professional personal tax preparers, since the course requires handling of Form 1040 and Schedule C.

â°Hours:

  • 24 Hours.

ğŸ“šCourse content:

  1. Business History
  2. Know the Commercial and Industrial Structures
  3. Advantages and disadvantages of each type of company
  4. Organization of a company
  5. Register a Company in the State and the Federal
  6. Mandatory declarations for each type of company and their annexes
  7. How to read and interpret accounting and banking reports
  8. How to report and complete forms: Schedule C, 1065, 1120S, and 1120
  9. Documents and obligations for registration and declarations to the State and Federal Government, based on: Company type, activity, employment, and economic and geographic situation.
  10. Offshore Company (Tax Havens)
  11. Explanation of Forms 1065, 1120, and 1120-SY Attachments
  12. Tax Obligations for Foreign Residents, Partners or Members of a Domestic Company
  13. Read and interpret accounting reports
  14. Payroll and obligations of employers and employees (payroll)
  15. HR and Business Administration and Management Tips

teacher-1.bio:
Professor of Taxes, Bookkeeping, Payroll, Constitution of Corporations
Carlos Catarino
EA, CAA, MBA Business Administration and Human Resources
With more than 30 years of experience in Taxation, Restructuring of Corporations worldwide, he brings all his experience, knowledge and Passion to each Course, Seminar and Specialization that he teaches.
Founder of Kta Institute
His sole objective is to Educate and Guide the immigrant in his total and Successful integration in the United States.
